items.title: Python Tips for Beginners
items.content_html:
Python Tips for Beginners

Here are some essential tips for Python beginners.

Tip 1: Use Virtual Environments

Always use virtual environments for your projects:

python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate

Tip 2: Follow PEP 8

Follow the PEP 8 style guide for clean, readable code.

Pro Tip

Use a linter like `flake8` or `ruff` to enforce style.

Tip 3: Use List Comprehensions

# Instead of:
squares = []
for x in range(10):
    squares.append(x**2)

# Use:
squares = [x**2 for x in range(10)]
Method Speed Readability
For loop Slower Good
List comp Faster Great
Map Fast Poor
items.content_text:
# Python Tips for Beginners

Here are some essential tips for Python beginners.

## Tip 1: Use Virtual Environments

Always use virtual environments for your projects:

```bash
python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate
```

## Tip 2: Follow PEP 8

Follow the PEP 8 style guide for clean, readable code.

!!! tip "Pro Tip"
    Use a linter like `flake8` or `ruff` to enforce style.

## Tip 3: Use List Comprehensions

```python
# Instead of:
squares = []
for x in range(10):
    squares.append(x**2)

# Use:
squares = [x**2 for x in range(10)]
```

| Method | Speed | Readability |
|--------|-------|-------------|
| For loop | Slower | Good |
| List comp | Faster | Great |
| Map | Fast | Poor |
items.summary: Essential Python tips for getting started

items.title: Hello World
items.content_html:
Welcome to Markata-Go

This is my first post using the markata-go static site generator.

Features

Here are some cool features:

  • Plugin-driven architecture
  • Powerful feed system
  • Jinja-like templates
  • Code highlighting
def hello():
    print("Hello, World!")

Getting Started

Check out the documentation to learn more about markata-go.

Links

  • Check out [[about|the about page]]
  • Visit the GitHub repository
items.content_text:
# Welcome to Markata-Go

This is my first post using the **markata-go** static site generator.

## Features

Here are some cool features:

- Plugin-driven architecture
- Powerful feed system
- Jinja-like templates
- Code highlighting

```python
def hello():
    print("Hello, World!")
```

!!! note "Getting Started"
    Check out the documentation to learn more about markata-go.

## Links

- Check out [[about|the about page]]
- Visit the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/example/markata-go)

items.title: About
items.content_html:
About This Site

This site is built with markata-go, a plugin-driven static site generator.

Features

  • Fast builds with Go
  • Flexible templating
  • Powerful feed system
  • Multiple output formats

Contact

Feel free to reach out!
